description:
The Nightmare (ranked 1st) is lifetime undefeated
(6-0). She has beaten every opponent she has ever
faced by an AVERAGE score of 302 pts! She is serious
about winning; she is brutal when fucking the loser.
She is the reason girls do not want to lose at US.
The Ninja (ranked 2nd) is undefeated this season (9-0)
with over 1000 style points and 43 submissions to her
credit. She has amassed 20 wins at US even though she
is one of the smallest wrestlers we have (109lbs). She
is cool, confident and cocky, and she has earned it.
Two undefeated wrestlers come together for the season
3 ULTIMATE SURRENDER CHAMPIONSHIP!
title: The Nightmare(5-0)
